Posts.Content: I am so sorry and you are not alone. My mom is presently on chemo for breast cancer that came back after seven years. She is so kind and the best mom anyone can have. I ask why her? Hugs.
Posts.Title: worried with my breast cancer

Posts.Content: My 78 year old mom was diagnosed in 2007 with ER/PR, HER-2/neu negative left breast cancer. Left masectomy, chemo and radiation was done. 2013 she came down with a cough and shortness of breath. Lung fluid resulted in cancer cells which showed a reversal of former test, ER/PR negative and HER-2/neu positive. She now has recurrent breast cancer in bones, lung and liver. If this is recurrent, why is it a reversal, could there have been a mistake somewhere, even doctor finds this interesting?
Posts.Title: Pathology results for breast cancer?
